JobFullDesc: Company DescriptionYouGov is an international research and data analytics group.Our mission is to supply a continuous stream of accurate data and insight about what the world thinks, so that companies, governments and institutions can better serve the people and communities that sustain them. We have the best data and the best tools. We continuously challenge conventional approaches to research, and we disrupt our industry to ensure that our clients always get the best solutions.We are driven by a set of shared values. We are fast, fearless and innovative. We work diligently to get it right. We are guided by accuracy, ethics and proven methodologies. We trust each other and bring these values into everything that we do. Each day, our highly engaged proprietary global panel of over 10 million people provides us with thousands of data points on consumer opinions, attitudes and behaviour. We combine this continuous stream of data with our research expertise to provide insights that enable intelligent decision-making and informed conversations.With operations in the UK, North America, Mainland Europe, the Nordics, the Middle East and Asia Pacific, YouGov has one of the world’s largest research networks.Job Description As a Key Account Director at YouGov, you’ll be the client facing day-to-day commercial lead for a group of accounts within the Tech and Telco sector. Reporting into the Head of Account Management, you will drive achievement of a sales target for your territory through cross-selling and upselling, ultimately increasing the value of your account group year on year. You will also lead a team made up of Account Managers and/or Account Coordinators.What will I be delivering?Developing and implementing a strategic account plan for each client in your territoryWorking closely with the Head of Account Management on sales planning and forecastingLeading on pricing proposals, contract and commercial negotiationsBuilding and growing relationships with budget holders in your account groupRepresenting YouGov at industry events and networking in order to grow your client baseProactively looking for strategic and innovative use cases for our data in order to continually demonstrate the value of our solutions to our clients.Supporting the cross-product proposition & strategy for the sectorBuilding on YouGov’s reputation amongst clients within the sectorCollaborating and partnering continuously with New Business, Client Services, and Product teamsActively coaching and mentoring your team of Account Managers & Coordinators to ensure the team is successful, both in interactions with clients and their professional developmentWhat’s in it for me?Be a senior member of the UK account management team and have influence across the wider organizationBe empowered to work autonomously to develop and execute your own strategy and plan for designated accountsStretch your creativity by working with clients who are the leaders in their sector to design innovative solutions to research and data problemsCreate synergy by bringing talent from across the YouGov business together in order to fully showcase YouGov’s connected data solutions What do I need to bring with me?An understanding of the role of research and data across the Tech & Telco sector, gained through experience in a relevant roleExperience in managing large complex stakeholder relationshipsA business development mindset and a desire to work in a high growth mindsetFamiliarity with at least one sales methodology and the key principles behind effective sales techniquesQualificationsTechnical skills and qualificationsExperience in a research, tech or telco environmentKnowledge of and experience in business development, account management, and/or subscription salesSales planning & forecastingCollaborative selling and solution & proposal developmentUnderstands the concept of value based selling and solution sales You will have previous experience managing a teamProficient user of MS Desktop applications and MS operating systems; Office suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint & Outlook)Knowledge of Salesforce a plusBehavioural competenciesPassionate about managing a teamCompetent at building effective and complex relationships with clients and internal stakeholders Excellent collaborator within a project and team settingConfident decision maker, with an eye for commercial drivers Passionate about data, research, tech & innovation Additional InformationAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.
